properties.description: Creating the view for PBI to show contract data

content.query:
--IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
--                FROM    sys.schemas
--                WHERE   name = 'mipins' )
--    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [mipins]');
--GO

--CREATE VIEW FOR EMPLOYEE DETAILS--

--CREATE OR ALTER VIEW mipins.vw_mipins_hr_employee_details
--AS

SELECT DISTINCT

ED1.LastName                                                        AS [Last Name],
ED1.FirstName                                                       AS [First Name],
CONCAT(ED1.FirstName, ' ', ED1.LastName)                            AS EmpFullName,
ED2.LastName                                                        AS [Manager Last Name],
ED2.FirstName                                                       AS [Manger First Name],
CONCAT(ED2.FirstName, ' ', ED2.LastName)                            AS ManagerFullName,
EF1.EmployeeID                                                      AS EmployeeNo,
EF1.PersNumber                                                      AS PersonNo,
pl1.*


FROM [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[hr_employee_fact]                   AS EF1

JOIN [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[hr_employee_dim]                    AS ED1
    ON EF1.EmployeeID = ED1.EmployeeID

JOIN [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[hr_record_fact]                     AS HR1
    ON EF1.EmployeeID = HR1.EmployeeID

JOIN [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[hr_pins_location_dim]               AS PL1
    ON HR1.LocationID = PL1.LocationID

JOIN [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[hr_employee_hr_hierarchy_dim]       AS H
    ON EF1.EmployeeID = H.EmployeeID

JOIN [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[hr_employee_fact]                   AS EF2
    ON H.ManagerEmployeeID = EF2.EmployeeID
    
JOIN [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[hr_employee_dim]                    AS ED2
    ON EF2.EmployeeID = ED2.EmployeeID

JOIN [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[hr_record_fact]                     AS HR2
    ON EF2.EmployeeID = HR2.EmployeeID

JOIN [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[hr_pins_location_dim]               AS PL2
    ON HR2.LocationID = PL2.LocationID


--WHERE 

--GO
